com.satispay.protocore.active

Interface PersistenceProtoCore

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ProtoCore

    public interface PersistenceProtoCore
extends ProtoCore
    Created by domenicovisconti on 16/09/16. This class describes the class that will handle persistence operation just after network operations. To achieve his task this interface need a reference to a PersistenceManager and a ProtoCoreProvider in order to know ho will persist the data and who will perform the network requests.

    • Method Detail

      • getPersistenceManager

        PersistenceManager getPersistenceManager()
        This has to be implemented by the final implementor. With this method a PersistenceManager has to be provided in order to persist data.
        Returns:
        an implementation of the interface PersistenceManager

      • getProtoCoreProvider

        ProtoCoreProvider getProtoCoreProvider()
        This has to be implemented by the final implementor. With this method a ProtoCoreProvider has to be provided in order to retrieve the ProtoCore which will handle the in store api requests.
        Returns:
        an implementation of the interface ProtoCoreProvider

      • getTransactionHistory

        default rx.Observable<HistoryTransactionsModel> getTransactionHistory(@Query(value="limit")
                                                                      int limit,
                                                                      @Query(value="starting_after")
                                                                      java.lang.String startingAfter,
                                                                      @Query(value="filter")
                                                                      java.lang.String filter)
        Description copied from interface: ProtoCore
        Get the list of the accepted transactions
        Specified by:
        getTransactionHistory in interface ProtoCore
        Parameters:
        limit - the count of transactions we want to receive
        startingAfter - the starting transactionId we want to retrieve transactions from (all the limit transactions) accepted accepted before transaction with startingAfterId will be retrieved)
        filter - the accepted filter is "proposed" this trigger the pending transaction request
        Returns:
        an Observable that emit the network response
